title: Daddy Fox
description: Assassin. Master of disguise. Criminally handsome and smart.Yep, the Fox had it all.Except someone to call his own.But he could make that happen, right? Who wouldn’t want him? He was a total catch.There were just a few tiny problems.His life was dangerous. He had enemies. And a job that he had to finish.He wasn’t entirely sure he knew how to take care of someone else. But surely there was a manual on how to be a good Daddy Dom, right?Oh, and the woman that he’d decided was his . . . had a boyfriend.Hold on tight . . . things are about to get interesting.Please note: This book is not meant to be read as a standalone. You will want to read the rest of the series first. This book is MMF and contains a sexy Daddy Dom who is an assassin and has a warped moral code.Triggers at front of book.
author: Laylah Roberts
